ygData.subject: Re: Enchanter Army.
ygData.msgSnippet: I believe that you are right. Usually I do cast a spell on the mob and then he turns to attack me. ... From: Ronnie G. Free II  To:
ygData.messageBody:
I believe that you are right. Usually I do cast a spell on the mob and then he turns to attack me.

-----Original Message-----
From: Ronnie G. Free II <tri-mix@...>
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, May 22, 1999 12:19 AM
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Enchanter Army.


Mushin,
For as long as I have played, the only time my Pet attacks is when either the Monster attacks Me, or if the monster attacks the Pet.. I have joined many fights using my combat skills that he has not joined.. Normally I have to use a Spell to get the mob to attack me so that he will join the fray..

Later,
Narcos
-----Original Message-----
From: Mushin <mushin@...>
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, May 21, 1999 9:39 PM
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Enchanter Army.


Actually our pet will attack if we strike a creature. As soon as we hit they will join in.

Mushin
